[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [IFlyout](./blockly.iflyout_interface.md)

## IFlyout interface

Interface for a flyout.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IFlyout extends IRegistrable, IFocusableTree 
```
**Extends:** [IRegistrable](./blockly.iregistrable_interface.md)<!-- -->, [IFocusableTree](./blockly.ifocusabletree_interface.md)

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[createBlock(originalBlock)](./blockly.iflyout_interface.createblock_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Create a copy of this block on the workspace.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[createDom(tagName)](./blockly.iflyout_interface.createdom_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Creates the flyout's DOM. Only needs to be called once. The flyout can either exist as its own svg element or be a g element nested inside a separate svg element.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[dispose()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.dispose_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Dispose of this flyout. Unlink from all DOM elements to prevent memory leaks.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getContents()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.getcontents_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Returns the list of flyout items currently present in the flyout. The `show` method parses the flyout definition into a list of actual flyout items. This method should return those concrete items, which may be used for e.g. keyboard navigation.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getHeight()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.getheight_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Get the height of the flyout.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getWidth()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.getwidth_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Get the width of the flyout.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getWorkspace()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.getworkspace_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Get the workspace inside the flyout.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getX()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.getx_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Calculates the x coordinate for the flyout position.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getY()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.gety_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Calculates the y coordinate for the flyout position.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[hide()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.hide_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Hide and empty the flyout.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[init(targetWorkspace)](./blockly.iflyout_interface.init_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Initializes the flyout.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[isBlockCreatable(block)](./blockly.iflyout_interface.isblockcreatable_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Does this flyout allow you to create a new instance of the given block? Used for deciding if a block can be "dragged out of" the flyout.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[isDragTowardWorkspace(currentDragDeltaXY)](./blockly.iflyout_interface.isdragtowardworkspace_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Determine if a drag delta is toward the workspace, based on the position and orientation of the flyout. This is used in determineDragIntention\_ to determine if a new block should be created or if the flyout should scroll.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[isScrollable()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.isscrollable_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[isVisible()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.isvisible_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Is the flyout visible?


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[position()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.position_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Position the flyout.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[reflow()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.reflow_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Reflow blocks and their mats.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[scrollToStart()](./blockly.iflyout_interface.scrolltostart_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Scroll the flyout to the beginning of its contents.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[setContainerVisible(visible)](./blockly.iflyout_interface.setcontainervisible_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Set whether this flyout's container is visible.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[setVisible(visible)](./blockly.iflyout_interface.setvisible_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Set whether the flyout is visible. A value of true does not necessarily mean that the flyout is shown. It could be hidden because its container is hidden.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[show(flyoutDef)](./blockly.iflyout_interface.show_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Show and populate the flyout.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
